Tint or shade a color

tint_color.Rd

Calculate a brighter or darker version of the original color.

Usage

tint_color(color, tint)

Arguments

color

String, either a color name known by R, or the hex rgb code of the background color.

tint

numeric value between -1 and +1. Negative values darkens and positive values brightens the original color.

Value

a hex rgb code as string.

Examples

tint_color("purple", 0.4)
#> [1] "#C679F6"
tint_color("#FFD530", -0.7)
#> [1] "#4C400E"
